index.name: vim
index.subtitle: Vim
index.about: Vim is a highly configurable text editor built to enable efficient text editing. It is an improved version of the vi editor distributed with most UNIX systems.
index.description: Watch screencasts over a list with the best free videos about VIM IDE.

books.title: A byte of Vim
books.description: This is a book which aims to help you to learn how to use the Vim editor (version 7), even if all you know is how to use the computer keyboard.
books.author: Swaroop C H
